verses.verse: Brothers, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> be overtaken <S%G4301><s%> in a fault, <S%G3900><s%> you which <S%G3588><s%> are spiritual, <S%G4152><s%> restore <S%G2675><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> an one in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of meekness; <S%G4236><s%> considering <S%G4648><s%> yourself, <S%G4572><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> be tempted. <S%G3985><s%>
Bear <S%G941><s%> you one <S%G240><s%> another's <S%G240><s%> burdens, <S%G922><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> fulfill <S%G378><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
For if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> himself to be something, <S%G5100><s%> when he is nothing, <S%G3367><s%> he deceives <S%G5422><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

But let every <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> prove <S%G1381><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> shall he have <S%G2192><s%> rejoicing <S%G2745><s%> in himself <S%G1438><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> and not in another. <S%G2087><s%>
For every <S%G1538><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> shall bear <S%G941><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> burden. <S%G5413><s%>
Let him that is taught <S%G2727><s%> in the word <S%G4487><s%> communicate <S%G2841><s%> to him that teaches <S%G2727><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> things.

Be not deceived; <S%G4105><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is not mocked: <S%G3456><s%> for whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> sows, <S%G4687><s%> that shall he also <S%G2532><s%> reap. <S%G2325><s%>

For he that sows <S%G4687><s%> to his flesh <S%G4561><s%> shall of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> corruption; <S%G5356><s%> but he that sows <S%G4687><s%> to the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> shall of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> reap <S%G2325><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> everlasting. <S%G166><s%>
And let us not be weary <S%G1573><s%> in well <S%G2570><s%> doing: <S%G4160><s%> for in due <S%G2398><s%> season <S%G2540><s%> we shall reap, <S%G2325><s%> if we faint <S%G1590><s%> not.

As we have <S%G2192><s%> therefore <S%G685><s%> <S%G3767><s%> opportunity, <S%G2540><s%> let us do <S%G2038><s%> good <S%G18><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, especially <S%G3122><s%> to them who are of the household <S%G3609><s%> of faith. <S%G4102><s%>
You see <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G4080><s%> large <S%G4080><s%> a letter <S%G1121><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> to you with my <S%G1699><s%> own hand. <S%G5495><s%>

As many <S%G3745><s%> as desire <S%G2309><s%> to make <S%G2146><s%> a fair <S%G2146><s%> show <S%G2146><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> they constrain <S%G315><s%> you to be circumcised; <S%G4059><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should suffer <S%G1377><s%> persecution <S%G1377><s%> for the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

For neither <S%G3761><s%> they themselves <S%G846><s%> who are circumcised <S%G4059><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> the law; <S%G3551><s%> but desire <S%G2309><s%> to have you circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> that they may glory <S%G2744><s%> in your <S%G5212><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

But God <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> forbid <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1096><s%> that I should glory, <S%G2744><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> in the cross <S%G4716><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> is crucified <S%G4717><s%> to me, and I to the world. <S%G2889><s%>

For in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> avails <S%G2480><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing, nor <S%G3777><s%> uncircumcision, <S%G203><s%> but a new <S%G2537><s%> creature. <S%G2937><s%>

And as many <S%G3745><s%> as walk <S%G4748><s%> according to this <S%G5129><s%> rule, <S%G2583><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> be on <S%G1909><s%> them, and mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and on the Israel <S%G2474><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

From now on <S%G3063><s%> let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> trouble <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3930><s%> me: for I bear <S%G941><s%> in my body <S%G4983><s%> the marks <S%G4742><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Brothers, <S%G80><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with your <S%G5212><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> To the Galatians written from Rome.
